DOC.brief_summary: Healthy volunteer food-effect study to determine the effect of food on uracil and dihydrouracil levels in plasma
DOC.brief_title: Food-effect Study on Uracil and Dihydrouracil Levels as a Diagnostic Marker of Dihydropyrimidine Dehydrogenase Activity
DOC.criteria: 1. Healthy volunteer; not known with cancer or current treatment for cancer 2. Age at least 18 years 3. Able and willing to give written informed consent 4. Able and willing to consume the prescribed breakfast 5. Able and willing to undergo blood sampling 1. Any treatment with investigational drugs within 30 days before the start of the study 2. Any condition that may interfere with the study protocol 3. Women who are pregnant 4. Allergies or intolerance for components of the prescribed breakfast
